channel.title: [317] Using An Item By Itself? [317]
channel.description:
Im Using Black Source + Client -.-"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pretty Much, I Want To Rub A Lamp, Then sendMessage("You Gain HP EXP"); addSkillXP(4, 1000); ^^^^^^^^^^^^<< Example
Delete The Item And Thats It, Done And Dusted?
Where Are The Codes Located? Ill Figure Out How To Use Them By Myself
~ Thanks[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2009, 05:44:13 pm[/size][hr]Theres 14 Members Reading Topics In This Board, Im Sure One Of You Know How Too -.-"
Don't Be Lazy, Please Help!
